scripts.check:all: npm run validate && npm run check:images && npm run check:accessibility
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run check:all && npm run build:prep
scripts.asset-sizes: bash -c 'for f in static/js/*.js static/css/*.css; do [ -f "$f" ] || continue; echo "$f"; ls -lh "$f" | gzip -c "$f" | wc -c; echo; done'
